title: 关闭伤害和饱食度
author: Absolutefield
txt_content:
我想关闭一个世界的伤害的饱食度（让他们都是满的）
请问需要如何解决

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
[娱乐]antifood——饥饿不减少，游戏服可用[1.8]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=514879
(出处: http://www.mcbbs.net/)
伤害是什么鬼？？

replies.author: Absolutefield
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2016-10-5 19:42
[娱乐]antifood——饥饿不减少，游戏服可用[1.8]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=5148 ...

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 柠檬TNT
replies.txt_content:
柠檬TNT 发表于 2016-10-5 22:19
/mv modify set diff 0调和平饥饿不掉
补充下关闭pvp的方法
关服，找到server.properties，把里面的pvp关掉就行~把pvp后面的ture改false

replies.author: 柠檬TNT
replies.txt_content: /mv modify set diff 0调和平饥饿不掉

replies.author: Absolutefield
replies.txt_content:
柠檬TNT 发表于 2016-10-5 22:19
/mv modify set diff 0调和平饥饿不掉
嗯···这是一个办法，能否让一个世界取消伤害而不是整一个端？

replies.author: 玩手游
replies.txt_content:
请提供你使用的多世界插件

如果是mv的话，打开Multiverse-Core的worlds，找到对应的世界，设置hunger为false

然后重启或者输入 /mv reload 即可

replies.author: Absolutefield
replies.txt_content:
玩手游 发表于 2016-10-6 00:23
请提供你使用的多世界插件

如果是mv的话，打开Multiverse-Core的worlds，找到对应的世界，设置hunger为fal ...
这个是设置饱食的吗？我想设置伤害，禁言伤害需要怎么设置？

replies.author: 卿风风
replies.txt_content:
world:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: world
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'true'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: NORMAL
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'true'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      x: -168.56967365180216
      y: 12.0
      z: 262.54040155803744
      pitch: 12.195803
      yaw: -20.141642
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: NORMAL
    seed: '-8411638646522855077'
    generator: 'null'
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'

以mv为例，这是我得world世界的配置，将hunger: 'true'和pvp: 'true' 改为false试试
